INTERNATIONAL SALES & BUSINESS  
DEVELOPMENT DIRECTOR  (EMEA)  
A results -focused and engaging Business  
Development Directo r with a track record  
of leading end -to-end sales lifecycles, key  
account management and solutions selling  
approaches . Successfully negotiated multi - 
year contracts  in the Middle East (EMEA  
Region) for THE BIG WORD GROUP (Global  
Translation & Interpreter Services), SAI  
GLOBAL LIMITED (Multinational QA, Audit  
& Certi fication Solutions) and IHS GLOBAL  
LIMITED (Defence & Security Intelligence  
Systems) . Added sales management roles in  
a multi -sector B2B online / media company.  
 
STRONG MULTI -SECTOR EXPERIENCE  
Proactively t argeting multi -sector clients  
across National Governments, Military &  
NATO organisations (B2G), international  
trade organisations  (embassies and trade  
delegations) and major corporations across  
B2B Defence, Oil & Gas, Natural Resources,  
Energy & Aerospace sectors .  
 
STRATEG IC & SOLUTIONS SELLING  
Confidently engaging senior client decision - 
makers over extended sales lifecycles ( 6-12 
months) . Includes detailed market analysis,  
lead generation, capture plans, pre -sales  
consultancy, tender bid proposals, key  
account management, client negotiation  
and deal closure to consistently exceed  
challenging targets ( won multiple awards) .  
 
SALES MANAGEMENT (EMEA Region)  
Strategic & Solutions Selling Approaches  
Strategic Selling & Account Management  
In-House Sales Management & Skills Training  
Sales Excellence Awards ( High  Performer)  
 
LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT  
UK National Armed Forces Liaison  Initiatives  
Uniformed Commissioned Training Officer  
Military Leadership Programme (ILM Level 4)  
  
ZIA MIR  
zia.mir.uk@gmail.com  | +44 7518 429933 (UK) 
Business Development Director (EMEA & North America) | Strategic & Solutions Selling | International Sales  
 
 
 
  
Technical Sales & Business Development • EMEA Region (Insights & Expertise) • Pre-Sales & Sales Lifecycle Management  
Client Enagement, Lead Generation & Capture Plans • Tender Bid Proposals & Contract Negotiation (Multi -Year Deals)  
 
Strategic & Solutions Selling (B2G & B2B) • Key Account Management Plans  • International Sales Training & Presentations  
High -Performer (Multiple Sales Awards)  • Multi -Sector Experience (Market Analysis)  • Project Mobilisation (In -Country Teams)  
 
 
 
  
2017 to date  | BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT DIRECTOR  (EMEA &  
North America) |  THE BIG WORD GROUP (TBW GLOBAL LTD)  
Global Professional Translation & Interpreter Services Company  
 
• Leading end -to-end sales, business development and turnkey solutions for 
supplying professional translators, interpreters and subject matter  experts  
(SMEs) to  National Government s, Military  & NATO  organisations alongside 
international embassies, trade departments, trade delegations and major 
corporations (Defence, Oil & Gas, Natural Resources, Energy & Aerospace) . 
 
• Reporting to the Group Chief Commercial Officer (CCO) & SVP Business 
Development . Consistently exceeded annual sales targets until COVID  by  
leading  solutions selling approaches, extended sales lifecycles (typically   
6-12 months) and pre -sales consultancy in collaboration with Bid Writers, 
Operations Teams, Recruitment Managers and Sub -Contracts Managers.  
 
• Delivering a portfolio of winning bids for multi -year contracts alongside  
sub-contractor partners (average value  £1.8M) . Managing strategic account  
relationships (Key Account Management) for major clients such as NATO  
with contract oversight for issues, changes, deviations and project teams.  
 
• Driving business development strategies to generate new opportunities  
and grow sales pipeline . Carefully scrutinising potential opportunities by 
researching , understanding the market landscape  and identifying major  
government, military and industry players  through extensive research /  
analysis to target  key prospects and proactively deploy capture plans.  
 
• Proactively engaging client Programme Directors, Project Managers and  
Business Development, Operations and Training Managers . Successfully  
built long -term

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
